statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT account_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, customer_name, last_login FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE status = FALSE ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE status=true ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, account_balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_email, customer_phone FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE status=false OR (customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND account_balance < 0) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM  CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC, last_login ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_status='active'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_id=1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT support_rep_name, support_rep_email FROM SupportRepresentatives
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, support_rep_name FROM CustomerAccounts INNER JOIN SupportRepresentatives ON CustomerAccounts.customer_id = SupportRepresentatives.support_rep_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, COUNT(*) as total_accounts FROM CustomerAccounts GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_accounts > 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC, customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance < 5000 AND phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT representative_id, name, email FROM SupportRepresentatives WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' AND representative_id = 3;

SELECT t.ticket_id, c.customer_name, r.name AS representative_name FROM CustomerSupportTickets t JOIN CustomerAccounts c ON t.customer_id = c.account_id JOIN SupportRepresentatives r ON t.representative_id = r.representative_id WHERE r.department = 'Technical Support';
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupportRepresentatives ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT rep_name, department FROM SupportRepresentatives WHERE rep_id = 3;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM SupportTickets GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_id = 100
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT rep_name, department FROM SupportRepresentatives ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM SupportTickets WHERE status='Open' AND account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE customer_name='John Doe')
SELECT account_id, customer_name, rep_id FROM SupportTickets INNER JOIN CustomerAccounts ON SupportTickets.account_id = CustomerAccounts.account_id WHERE rep_id = 200 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, status, created_at FROM CustomerTickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT rep_name, rep_department FROM SupportRepresentatives WHERE rep_department = 'Sales' ORDER BY rep_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE account_id = 101 OR account_id = 105;

SELECT account_id, customer_name, account_balance FROM CustomerAccounts JOIN CustomerTickets ON CustomerAccounts.account_id = CustomerTickets.account_id WHERE status = 'Open' GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 1;
SELECT rep_name, rep_email, rep_department FROM SupportRepresentatives WHERE rep_department LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, account_id, rep_id, status FROM CustomerTickets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
